casebody.data:
ARAB BANK, PLC, petitioner,
v.
Courtney LINDE, et al. No. 12-1485. Supreme Court of the United States June 30, 2014. Case below, 706 F.3d 92 . Motion of The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of The Union of Arab Banks for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
